title: Prologue to a Supposed Play - "naked facts" will

content.prompt: The speaker suggests that the “naked facts” (line 22) will

choices.label: shock naïve audiences with a cynical picture of human nature
enable those attending the play to indulge in wishful fantasies
challenge playgoers to tolerate the playwright’s bias against hypocrites
encourage members of the audience to address their own weaknesses

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
